name: 0-Kara no Shogi: Shogi Youchien - Ayumi Gumi
name_original: 0-Kara no Shogi: Shogi Youchien - Ayumi Gumi
description:
Do you know how to play shogi?

If you've never had the chance to play, this game will teach you everything you need to know. From the basics to more advanced tricks, you can study them all to become the ultimate shogi master!

Test your wits in matches, review shogi terminology by checking the explanations, and read classic proverbs to help motivate you while you hone your skills.
